column4: hello, where can i find xserver-xorg-video-intel-2.7? it used to be on my repos but cant find it after a reinstallation
it looks like it's just xserver-xorg-video-intel now, with no version number
i know but -intel-2.7 works so much better than 2.9...
ah, okay. sorry, I don't know any more than that :)
